Name: Advanced Final Attack
Desc:
Permanently increases ATT, and significantly increases Final Attack's activation rate and DAMAGE.
Required Skill: Lv. 20 Final Attack

H.Old:
Permanently increases ATT +30.
[Final Attack Skill] attacks have a 60% chance of additional 3 attacks at 180% DAMAGE.
H.New:
Permanently increases ATT +30.
[Final Attack Type Skill] Successful attacks create a 60% chance of attacking at 180% Damage 3 more times.
